title: Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 4
description:
Criticism of Psychiatry and  Psychoanalysis - Collection 4:

We have 33 titles in this upload:

-  Asch - Psychoanalysis; Its Evolution and Development (2004)

-  Bentall - Doctoring the Mind; Why Psychiatric Treatments Fail (2009)

-  Breggin - The Anti-Depressant Fact Book; What Your Doctor Won't Tell You about Prozac, Zoloft, Paxil, Celexa and Luvox (2001)

-  Breggin & Breggin - Talking Back to Prozac; What Doctors Aren't Telling You About Prozac and the Newer Antidepressants (1994)

-  Cleckley - The Mask of Sanity; an Attempt to Clarify Some Issues About the So-Called Psychopathic Personality, 5e (1988)

-  Damousi & Plotkin (Eds.) - The Transnational Unconscious; Essays in the History of Psychoanalysis and Transnationalism (2009)

-  Davies - Cracked; the Unhappy Truth About Psychiatry (2013)

-  Delgado & Strawn - Difficult Psychiatric Consultations; an Integrated Approach (2014)

-  Drummond - The Complete Guide to Psychiatric Drugs; Straight Talk for Best Results, Revised and Expanded Edition (2006)

-  Feltham (Ed.) - Controversies in Psychotherapy and Counselling (1999)

-  Ferro - Seeds of Illness, Seeds of Recovery; the Genesis of Suffering and the Role of Psychoanalysis (2005)

-  Forter & Miller - Desire of the Analysts; Psychoanalysis and Cultural Criticism (2008)

-  Greedharry - Postcolonial Theory and Psychoanalysis; from Uneasy Engagements to Effective Critique (2008)

-  Hecht - Understanding Drugs; Antidepressants & Antianxiety Drugs (2011)

-  Henriques - A New Unified Theory of Psychology (2011)

-  Hill & Kral - About Psychology; Essays at the Crossroads of History, Theory, and Philosophy (2003)

-  Katz - Depression and Drugs; the Neurobehavioral Structure of a Psychological Storm (2013)

-  Lebow (Ed.) - Twenty-First Century Psychotherapies; Contemporary Approaches to Theory and Practice (2008)

-  Moncrieff - The Bitterest Pills; the Troubling Story of Antipsychotic Drugs (2013)

-  Orford - Community Psychology; Challenges, Controversies and Emerging Consensus (2008)

-  Rycroft - A Critical Dictionary of Psychoanalysis, 2e (1995)

-  Salloum & Mezzich (Eds.) - Psychiatric Diagnosis; Challenges and Prospects (2009)

-  Scher & Rauscher (Eds.) - Evolutionary Psychology; Alternative Approaches (2003)

-  Schlesinger - Endings & Beginnings; On Terminating Psychotherapy and Psychoanalysis, 2e (2014)

-  Schraube & Osterkamp (Eds.) - Psychology from the Standpoint of the Subject; Selected Writings of Klaus Holzkamp (2013)

-  Segal - Psychoanalysis, Literature and War, Papers 1972-1995 (1997)

-  Stewart - Catastrophe and Survival; Walter Benjamin and Psychoanalysis (2010)

-  Szasz - Cruel Compassion, Psychiatric Control of Society's Unwanted (1994)

-  Szasz - The Myth of Mental Illness, Foundations of a Theory of Personal Conduct (1974)

-  Tolman & Maiers (Eds.) - Critical Psychology; Contributions to an Historical Science of the Subject (1991)

-  Totton (Ed.) - The Politics of Psychotherapy; New Perspectives (2005)

-  Tuckett et al - Psychoanalysis Comparable & Incomparable; the Evolution of a Method to Describe and Compare Psychoanalytic Approaches (2008)

-  Verhagen et al (Eds.) - Religion and Psychiatry; Beyond Boundaries (2010)
